item.title: Maximizing Docker Desktop: How Signing In Unlocks Advanced Features
item.description: Signing into Docker Desktop unlocks advanced features and integrations, enabling developers and admins to fully leverage Dockerâ€™s cloud-native tools for enhanced productivity, security, and scalability. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/maximizing-docker-desktop/

item.title: Using AI Tools to Convert a PDF into Images
item.description: Learn how to turn a PDF into a bunch of images with the help of Docker and AI tools. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/using-ai-tools-to-convert-a-pdf-into-images/
